unduwave.unduwave_incl
======================

.. py:module:: unduwave.unduwave_incl

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Contains the import statements for undupy modules



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   unduwave.unduwave_incl.cm_inch


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   unduwave.unduwave_incl.to_scn


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: to_scn(number, norm = True)

   Converts number to string using scientific notation

   :param number: The number to convert
   :param norm: If true, std scientific notation, False: With leading 0.
   :return: The resulting string.


.. py:data:: cm_inch

   Conversion factor cm to inch
